description: Alimentando el Manana programme promotes plant-based nutrition to enhance individual diets and support environmental sustainability. Operating in Argentina, France, and India, it aims to address health and food justice crises by advocating for vegetable consumption. The initiative collaborates with local organizations, schools, and hospitals to provide training and resources for chefs, ensuring meals are nutritious and environmentally friendly. By fostering dietary changes, it seeks to create a healthier future while minimizing ecological impact.
name: Alimentando el Manana
